# Introduction

This Quarto extension is created for document organization of my recent project.
It mainly provides the following features:

- [x] Chinese support
- [ ] render targets:
    - [x] HTML website
    - [ ] single-file PDF book
    - [ ] JIRA markup files
- [ ] flexible organization of seperate notes
    - [ ] unlimited folder levels
    - [ ] index page by date
- [ ] intergration with Git and DVC
    - [ ] embedding versioned files
    - [ ] tracking related commits
